## Description {#details}

Byte stream of .debug&#95;loc entries.

Stores a unified stream of .debug&#95;loc entries. There&#39;s <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debuglocstream/list">List</a></em> for each variable/inlined-at pair, and an <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debuglocstream/entry">Entry</a></em> for each <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debuglocentry">DebugLocEntry</a></em>.

FIXME: Do we need all these temp symbols? FIXME: Why not output directly to the output stream?

Definition at line 30 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>.

### finalizeList() {#a28505bb0242e560d63d2528869b7980d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool DebugLocStream::finalizeList (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter">AsmPrinter</a> &amp; Asm)</>}>
Finalize a .debug&#95;loc entry list.

If there are no entries in this list, delete it outright. Otherwise, create a label with <em>Asm</em>.


<SectionUser title="Returns">
false iff the list is deleted.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h/#l00091">91</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-cpp/#l00015">15</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-cpp">DebugLocStream.cpp</a>.

### startEntry() {#a44a494f353f42cc17d694ea58a06f32e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::DebugLocStream::startEntry (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; BeginSym, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42; EndSym)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Start a new .debug&#95;loc entry.

Until the next call, bytes added to the stream will be added to this entry.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h/#l00097">97</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>.

### startList() {#aff0db571c85f957fd59901d8c6f15912}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>size&#95;t llvm::DebugLocStream::startList (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfcompileunit">DwarfCompileUnit</a> &#42; CU)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Start a new .debug&#95;loc entry list.

Start a new .debug&#95;loc entry list. Return the new list&#39;s index so it can be retrieved later via <em><a href="#a133d418b21dfa17cb06cb48e99a2b504">getList()</a></em>.

Until the next call, <em>startEntry()</em> will add entries to this list.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h/#l00079">79</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/debuglocstream-h">DebugLocStream.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
